description_html: The Ottawa modular sofa system is BoConcept’s foray into contract furniture. Comfortable yet durable, the sofa system is composed of various configurable shapes that can build endlessly, making it ideal for public and business settings. Elements can be arranged to invite socialization as well as provide privacy due to its multidirectional modularity. It is also multifunctional, with a sleek side table and power ports for charging electronic devices built in. Soft and inviting, yet tested for strength and safety, the Ottawa modular sofa system smartly reimagines contract furniture for our current age.
